p: Watering regimes, ABA and their interaction significantly ( P < 0.0001) altered plant biological yield, but the effect of the year treatment was not significant ( P > 0.05) (Fig. 10). Without ABA application, moderate and severe drought decreased biological yield by 18.17% and 39.83%, respectively, compared to well-watered condition. ABA application caused a descending trend in biological yield, meaning that biological yield decreased with increasing ABA concentration in all moisture conditions (Fig. 10).
